casebody.data:
A BETTER WAY WHOLESALE AUTOS, INC.
v.
Shannon GAUSE Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided November 7, 2018

Kenneth A. Votre, in support of the petition.

The plaintiff's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 184 Conn. App. 643, 195 A.3d 747 (2018), is denied.

MULLINS, J., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
